description: An integration test file for a Flutter application, testing route mounting and widget rebuild stability.

classes.name: IntegrationTestWidgetsFlutterBinding
classes.description: Flutter's testing binding for integration tests, ensuring proper setup for widget testing.

methods.name: _pumpUntil
methods.description: Repetitively pumps the widget tree until a specified condition becomes true or a timeout occurs.

methods.name: _waitForFinder
methods.description: Uses _pumpUntil to wait until a widget matching the Finder exists in the widget tree.
